index.title: Kredito≈ærouti
index.subtitle: V≈†E Course Finder
index.description: Start by selecting your study plan. We will show you relevant courses and their schedule slots based on your selection.
index.step4: Browse courses and build your schedule

courses.coursesInTimetable: {count} course in timetable | {count} courses in timetable
courses.clearTimetableConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove all courses from the timetable?
courses.conflictTitle: You have conflicts in your timetable
courses.changePlanConfirm: Changing the study plan will clear your current timetable. Do you want to proceed?
courses.noCoursesFound: No courses found matching the filters.

emptyTimetable.title: Your timetable is empty
emptyTimetable.description: Add courses from the list or drag across empty slots to search for courses at that time.

StudyPlanWizard.title: Welcome to Kredito≈ærouti
StudyPlanWizard.description: Select your study plan to view available courses

WizardStepFaculty.title: Select Faculty
WizardStepFaculty.description: Choose the faculty where you study or want to study.

WizardStepYear.title: Select Enrollment Year
WizardStepYear.description: Choose the academic year when you started studying. The winter semester will be automatically selected.
WizardStepYear.tip: If you don't know which year to select, check your e-index in InSIS or look at the academic year of your first enrolled semester.

WizardStepStudyPlan.title: Select Study Plan
WizardStepStudyPlan.description: Choose your study plan (field of study). You can select multiple plans if you have a specialization.
WizardStepStudyPlan.resultsCount: Found {count} study plan | Found {count} study plans
WizardStepStudyPlan.noResults: No study plans match the filter.
WizardStepStudyPlan.specializationInfoDescription: If your study program includes a specialization (e.g., minor), select both your base study plan AND your specialization. Click on plans to toggle selection.
WizardStepStudyPlan.doubleClickTip: Tip: Double-click a plan to select it and proceed immediately.

CourseRowExpanded.noUnitsAvailable: No schedule units are available for this course.
CourseRowExpanded.incompleteSelectionDescription: To enroll in this course, you must also select: {types}. Please select all required unit types.

CourseStatusSummary.selectedTooltip: Click to show only selected courses
CourseStatusSummary.conflictTooltip: Click to show courses with time conflicts
CourseStatusSummary.incompleteTooltip: Click to show courses with missing unit types
CourseStatusSummary.allComplete: All course units selected, no conflicts!

CourseStatusFilter.title: My Courses
CourseStatusFilter.helpText: Click to filter. Select multiple options to combine filters.

TimetableCourseBlock.mergedSlots: {count} time slot merged | {count} time slots merged

TimetableDragPopover.title: Search Courses
TimetableDragPopover.description: Shows courses that have a schedule slot in this time period.

TimetableCourseModal.filterDescription: Showing courses available on {day} from {from} to {to}

errors.unitTypeAlreadySelected: You already have a {unitType} selected for this course
